definitions.definition: The use of drugs to improve athletic performance .
The addition of small quantities of an element (a dopant ) to a semiconductor to change its characteristics.
The applying of dope to a substrate such as airplane fabric, or the coating thus produced.

main_definition: ( sports ) The use of drugs to improve athletic performance .
secondary_definitions: The addition of small quantities of an element (a dopant ) to a semiconductor to change its characteristics.
The applying of dope to a substrate such as airplane fabric, or the coating thus produced.
